main event: Multiple witnesses, including CAP personnel, observed a red cylindrical object with three large red lights maneuvering at high speeds over Greenwood, Mississippi.
interesting points: The object was reported to have no sound as it hovered and then traveled downward at a high speed., Various witnesses including an oil company operator and the CAP personnel corroborated the sighting., The sightings were reported over Greenwood and Greenville at different times but involved the same object., The objects appeared larger than aircraft lights and emitted radiant heat., The sightings were documented in the early 1950s and involved other reported aircraft activity in the area.
sighted object: a red cylindrical object with three large red lights
witness description: Civilian and military personnel, including oil company operators and CAP members.
